summary: Rusty (Hatosy) starts to pursue a path to a more meaningful life, thanks to his connection to Bob (Goldblum), the boyfriend of his mother, Mary (Lynch). His new take on life causes friction with his best friend, Dallas (Caan), and both men find their friendship pushed to its breaking point, causing them to make life-changing decisions.
cast: Scott Caan|Jeff Goldblum|Shawn Hatosy|Kelly Lynch|Heavy D|Val Lauren|Bob Gunton|Marley Shelton|Selma Blair|Isla Fisher|Freddy Rodríguez|Raymond T.
